properties.name: spring.datasource.maximum-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum number of threads available that allow for safe isolation of the blocking operations.

properties.name: exception.security.incorrect-credentials
properties.description: Error code for an exception which is thrown if login or password is incorrect.

properties.name: exception.users.user-not-found
properties.description: Error code for an exception which is thrown if a user doesn't exist.

properties.name: exception.users.user-login-already-exists
properties.description: Error code for an exception which is thrown if someone is trying to add a user with already taken login.

properties.name: jwt.private-key-file-name
properties.description: The name of the file that contains the private key for jwt encryption.

properties.name: exception.internal.monkeys-ran-out-of-bananas
properties.description: Error code when something unexpected happen on backend.
